item.name: Get group level metadata for one or more groups

response.name: Success response: Returns metadata about groups

item.name: Remove a group and it's messages from the store

response.name: Success response: The group and it's messaegs were removed

request.description: Insert or update a group's default configuration

response.name: Success response: The default configuration was inserted/updated

request.description: Gets the default configuration of a priority group

response.name: Success response: The group defaults are returned

request.description: Remove default configuration for a priority group

response.name: Success response: The default configuration was removed
Internal server error: The default config was not removed
Success response: The message was added to the store
No error was encountered, but the store rejected the message

request.description: Get a message from the store

response.name: Success response: A message was returned if found

request.description: Removes a message from the store

response.name: Success response: The message was removed if present

request.description: Get the store's inserted, deleted, and pruned count statistics

response.name: Success response: The store's statistics are returned
Success respons: The store's statistics were updated
Internal server error: The stats were not updated

request.description: Reset the store's inserted, deleted, and pruned count statistics

response.name: Success response: The store's statistics were reset
Internal server error: The stats were not reset.

item.name: Exports messages to a file, while removing the messages from the store

query.description: (Required) The directory to save the export file in
An optional priority group to export
A range of groups to export starting with this index
A range of groups to export ending with this index

response.name: Success response: Designated messages have been exported
Bad request: Missing or invalid parameter
